dx-empty - CodeSettings
Overview    Classes    Enums    Interfaces    Triggers    SObjects    Index




Class CodeSettings

public class CodeSettings

Utils for reading records from 'CodeSettings' custom metadata type

Changes

07/14/2018 Initial version.
04/05/2021 getAsList, getValueAsList: Returns the JSON settings value as a list of strings.
04/05/2021 getAsMap, getValueAsMap: Returns the JSON settings value as a map.
04/11/2021 getValueAsList: Expand method to return comma delimited values.
04/25/2021 getSettings: Get string set with all settings.
10/18/2023 Support for long values, upgrade to API 59.0.
08/19/2021 getListValue(): Trim values and split by comma. Does not remove spaces and blank values.
